articles.title: Diablo IV won't copy Immortal's game-altering microtransactions - Ars Technica
articles.description: Blizzard devs say purchases will be limited to "optional cosmetic items."
articles.content:

articles.title: DNA nanotech safe for medical use, new study suggests - Nanowerk
articles.description: Researchers found that while high amounts of DNA nanotechnology devices can cause a slight immune response, it isn't marked enough to be dangerous. Their findings also suggest that different shapes may be more conducive to different therapeutic applications.
articles.content:
